---

# Create Wallet

Create ERC-4337 smart wallets for your users with customizable options.

## Basic wallet creation

Wallets are created automatically when users authenticate:

```typescript
import { useSmartWallet } from '@varity/ui-kit';

function CreateWalletButton() {
  const { createWallet, wallet, isLoading } = useSmartWallet();

  if (wallet) {
    return <p>Wallet: {wallet.address}</p>;
  }

  return (
    <button onClick={createWallet} disabled={isLoading}>
      {isLoading ? 'Creating...' : 'Create Wallet'}
    </button>
  );
}
```

## Wallet options

Configure wallet behavior:

```typescript
const { createWallet } = useSmartWallet({
  // Auto-create wallet on auth
  autoCreate: true,

  // Chain to deploy wallet on
  chainId: 33529, // Varity L3
});
```

## Check wallet status

```typescript
const { wallet, isDeployed, isLoading, error } = useSmartWallet();

if (error) {
  console.error('Wallet error:', error);
}

if (isDeployed) {
  console.log('Wallet deployed at:', wallet.address);
}
```
